text: Muzaffarabad is town near Multan on Muzaffargarh Multan road.Muzaffarabad Map It is famous for Colony Textile Mill, one of the largest textile mills of Pakistan. According to official and newspapers reports, 14 workers were killed in 1978 in Colony Textile Mill. Mussawat, newspaper, reported a total of 22 deaths. But unofficial estimates put the total number as high as 150–200.PAKISTAN'S CHICAGO: 1978 MASSACRE AT COLONY TEXTILE MILLS ==See also== Muzaffarabad railway station. ==References== Category:Multan District
title: Muzaffarabad, Multan
